莧.definition: amaranth (genus Amaranthus); Joseph's coat (Amaranthus tricolor); Chinese spinach (Amaranth mangostanus)

莧科.definition: Amaranthaceae, family of herbaceous plants containing Chinese spinach (Amaranthus inamoenus) 莧菜|苋菜[xian4 cai4]

莧菜.definition: amaranth greens (genus Amaranthus); Chinese spinach (Amaranth mangostanus)
